OBU.Descr: Container of all the required information useful to connect to Arriva OBU.

RemotePort.Descr: TCP port on the OBU for the Arriva protocol

FTP.Descr: Container of all the required information useful for the FTP transfer from Arriva.

SourceDirectory.Descr: path of the local directory to find the file for connections.

Filename.Descr: name of the file to use for connections.

PollTime.Descr: Polling time to check directory for connections file (in seconds)

ConnectionSource.desc: connection source for transfer set. values admitted: {ArrivaProtocol, Ftp}

MaxDepartures.desc: maximum connections in the departures file. Values admitted {1; 100}. Default value: 100
